body_html:
just tried this on a fresh master. After the the normal build is done, I build with user op with
MSBuild /p:Configuration=RelWithDebInfo /p:BuildProjectReferences=false ackermann_ops.vcxproj

python \src\tensorflow\tensorflow\user_ops\ackermann_test.py
and
cd python \src\tensorflow\tensorflow\user_ops
python ackermann_test.py

both work ok.

body:
just tried this on a fresh master. After the the normal build is done, I build with user op with
MSBuild /p:Configuration=RelWithDebInfo /p:BuildProjectReferences=false ackermann_ops.vcxproj

python \src\tensorflow\tensorflow\user_ops\ackermann_test.py
and
cd python \src\tensorflow\tensorflow\user_ops\
python ackermann_test.py

both work ok.
